sqlMap.select:
select T.CANDIDATE_ID, R.ITEM_ID, R.START_TIME, R.END_TIME, R.SOLD_QUALITY, R.PRICE, R.SHIPPING_TYPE, R.SHIPPING_FEE, R.SELLING_PER_DAY, R.SELLING_DAYS, R.NAME, R.URL, R.SELLER_ID, R.IMAGE_URL, R.CURRENCY_ID, R.SITE_ID, R.BID_COUNT, R.COUNTRY, R.CATEGORY_ID, R.CATEGORY_NAME, R.LOCATION, R.TIME_LEFT, R.SKU, R.LISTING_TYPE from EB_CANDIDATE_ITEM_REF T,EB_ITEM R WHERE T.ITEM_ID=R.ITEM_ID
order by $orderByClause$

select T.CANDIDATE_ID, R.ITEM_ID, R.START_TIME, R.END_TIME, R.SOLD_QUALITY, R.PRICE, R.SHIPPING_TYPE, R.SHIPPING_FEE, R.SELLING_PER_DAY, R.SELLING_DAYS, R.NAME, R.URL, R.SELLER_ID, R.IMAGE_URL, R.CURRENCY_ID, R.SITE_ID, R.BID_COUNT, R.COUNTRY, R.CATEGORY_ID, R.CATEGORY_NAME, R.LOCATION, R.TIME_LEFT, R.SKU, R.LISTING_TYPE from EB_CANDIDATE_ITEM_REF T,EB_ITEM R WHERE T.ITEM_ID=R.ITEM_ID
T.CANDIDATE_ID=#value#

select T.CANDIDATE_ID, R.ITEM_ID, R.START_TIME, R.END_TIME, R.SOLD_QUALITY, R.PRICE, R.SHIPPING_TYPE, R.SHIPPING_FEE, R.SELLING_PER_DAY, R.SELLING_DAYS, R.NAME, R.URL, R.SELLER_ID, R.IMAGE_URL, R.CURRENCY_ID, R.SITE_ID, R.BID_COUNT, R.COUNTRY, R.CATEGORY_ID, R.CATEGORY_NAME, R.LOCATION, R.TIME_LEFT, R.SKU, R.LISTING_TYPE from EB_CANDIDATE_ITEM_REF T,EB_ITEM R WHERE T.ITEM_ID=R.ITEM_ID
R.SELLER_ID=#value#
sqlMap.insert: insert into EB_CANDIDATE_ITEM_REF (CANDIDATE_ID, ITEM_ID, START_TIME, END_TIME, SOLD_QUALITY, PRICE, SHIPPING_TYPE, SHIPPING_FEE, SELLING_PER_DAY, SELLING_DAYS, NAME, URL, SELLER_ID, IMAGE_URL, CURRENCY_ID, SITE_ID, BID_COUNT, COUNTRY, CATEGORY_ID, CATEGORY_NAME, LOCATION, TIME_LEFT, SKU, LISTING_TYPE) values (#candidateId:VARCHAR#, #ebItem.itemId:VARCHAR#, #ebItem.startTime:TIMESTAMP#, #ebItem.endTime:TIMESTAMP#, #ebItem.soldQuality:DECIMAL#, #ebItem.price:DECIMAL#, #ebItem.shippingType:VARCHAR#, #ebItem.shippingFee:DECIMAL#, #ebItem.sellingPerDay:DECIMAL#, #ebItem.sellingDays:DECIMAL#, #ebItem.name:VARCHAR#, #ebItem.url:VARCHAR#, #ebItem.sellerId:VARCHAR#, #ebItem.imageUrl:VARCHAR#, #ebItem.currencyId:VARCHAR#, #ebItem.siteId:VARCHAR#, #ebItem.bidCount:DECIMAL#, #ebItem.country:VARCHAR#, #ebItem.categoryId:VARCHAR#, #ebItem.categoryName:VARCHAR#, #ebItem.location:VARCHAR#, #ebItem.timeLeft:VARCHAR#, #ebItem.sku:VARCHAR#, #ebItem.listingType:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.update:
update EB_CANDIDATE_ITEM_REF
CANDIDATE_ID = #record.candidateId:VARCHAR#
ITEM_ID = #record.ebItem.itemId:VARCHAR#
START_TIME = #record.ebItem.startTime:TIMESTAMP#
END_TIME = #record.ebItem.endTime:TIMESTAMP#
SOLD_QUALITY = #record.ebItem.soldQuality:DECIMAL#
PRICE = #record.ebItem.price:DECIMAL#
SHIPPING_TYPE = #record.ebItem.shippingType:VARCHAR#
SHIPPING_FEE = #record.ebItem.shippingFee:DECIMAL#
SELLING_PER_DAY = #record.ebItem.sellingPerDay:DECIMAL#
SELLING_DAYS = #record.ebItem.sellingDays:DECIMAL#
NAME = #record.ebItem.name:VARCHAR#
URL = #record.ebItem.url:VARCHAR#
SELLER_ID = #record.ebItem.sellerId:VARCHAR#
IMAGE_URL = #record.ebItem.imageUrl:VARCHAR#
CURRENCY_ID = #record.ebItem.currencyId:VARCHAR#
SITE_ID = #record.ebItem.siteId:VARCHAR#
BID_COUNT = #record.ebItem.bidCount:DECIMAL#
COUNTRY = #record.ebItem.country:VARCHAR#
CATEGORY_ID = #record.ebItem.categoryId:VARCHAR#
CATEGORY_NAME = #record.ebItem.categoryName:VARCHAR#
LOCATION = #record.ebItem.location:VARCHAR#
TIME_LEFT = #record.ebItem.timeLeft:VARCHAR#
SKU = #record.ebItem.sku:VARCHAR#
LISTING_TYPE = #record.ebItem.listingType:VARCHAR#

update EB_CANDIDATE_ITEM_REF set CANDIDATE_ID = #record.candidateId:VARCHAR#, ITEM_ID = #record.ebItem.itemId:VARCHAR#, START_TIME = #record.ebItem.startTime:TIMESTAMP#, END_TIME = #record.ebItem.endTime:TIMESTAMP#, SOLD_QUALITY = #record.ebItem.soldQuality:DECIMAL#, PRICE = #record.ebItem.price:DECIMAL#, SHIPPING_TYPE = #record.ebItem.shippingType:VARCHAR#, SHIPPING_FEE = #record.ebItem.shippingFee:DECIMAL#, SELLING_PER_DAY = #record.ebItem.sellingPerDay:DECIMAL#, SELLING_DAYS = #record.ebItem.sellingDays:DECIMAL#, NAME = #record.ebItem.name:VARCHAR#, URL = #record.ebItem.url:VARCHAR#, SELLER_ID = #record.ebItem.sellerId:VARCHAR#, IMAGE_URL = #record.ebItem.imageUrl:VARCHAR#, CURRENCY_ID = #record.ebItem.currencyId:VARCHAR#, SITE_ID = #record.ebItem.siteId:VARCHAR#, BID_COUNT = #record.ebItem.bidCount:DECIMAL#, COUNTRY = #record.ebItem.country:VARCHAR#, CATEGORY_ID = #record.ebItem.categoryId:VARCHAR#, CATEGORY_NAME = #record.ebItem.categoryName:VARCHAR#, LOCATION = #record.ebItem.location:VARCHAR#, TIME_LEFT = #record.ebItem.timeLeft:VARCHAR#, SKU = #record.ebItem.sku:VARCHAR#, LISTING_TYPE = #record.ebItem.listingType:VARCHAR#
